name: Geometry Eater
description:
The objective is to clean the room by eating the other shapes in the least amount of time.
Move your character with the mouse
Select the shapes using '1' '2' and '3'
Use CTRL when required to reset the position of your blue friends.

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
"Super Spiffy" by David Fesliyan
